tweet.text: As Secretary of State, Albright promoted the expansion of NATO eastward into the former Soviet bloc nations and called for military intervention under NATO auspices during the humanitarian crisis in Kosovo. • https://t.co/0PCOFI9Oj7 • https://t.co/fTx22Hmw4Q
